text: Yesli zhe neveruyushchiye otritsayut voskresheniye kak nevozmozhnoye delo, to tvoim Gospodom-Tvortsom klyanus', chto My soberom neveruyushchikh i shaytanov, kotoryye vveli ikh v soblazn, zabludili i priveli k neveriyu. My soberom ikh vokrug geyenny unizhenno kolenopreklononnymi ot sil'nogo strakha i boyazni
